file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-61-04-02 - TRANSMITTER BATTERY - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TRANSMITTER BATTERY - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the battery installed in the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT). B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-61-04-900-801-A ♦ ELT BATTERY - REPLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-61-04 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-04-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELT BATTERY - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to replace the ELT battery. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT 110-4) AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-801-A/400 - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT SA- AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-802-A/400 TORI) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-803-A/400 C406-2) - REMOVAL EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT 110-4) AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-801-A/400 - INSTALLATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT SA- AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-802-A/400 TORI) - INSTALLATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER (ELT AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-803-A/400 C406-2) - INSTALLATION ARTEX CMM 570-1015 - ARTEX CMM 570-5000 - CMM ELT96A 25 60 000 000 / ELT97A 25 60 000 000 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Center fuselage IV, on the right side D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task ELT unit EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 25-61-04 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the ELT: • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX 110-4, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-801-A/400. • On aircraft with ELT SATORI, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-802-A/400. • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX C406-2, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-000-803-A/ 400. J. Replace ELT Battery SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Replace the battery: • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX 110-4, refer to the latest revision of ARTEX CMM 570-1015. • On aircraft with ELT SATORI, refer to the latest revision of CMM ELT96A 25 60 000 000 / ELT97A 25 60 000 000. • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX C406-2, refer to the latest revision of ARTEX CMM 570-5000. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the ELT: • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX 110-4, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-801-A/400. • On aircraft with ELT SATORI, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-802-A/400. • On aircraft with ELT ARTEX C406-2, refer to AMM TASK 25-61-01-400-803-A/ 400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 25-61-04 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
